titles.get-started-p: Simply answer a few questions to help us understand your mental condition and provide you with the best consultation possible.
titles.therapist-match-p: We will contact you to provide you with information about your health and to recommend the ideal candidate for a consulting session.
titles.at-your-convenience-p: Feel cosy at your own place and have your session whenever you want.
titles.attention: If you are having crisis or suicidal thoughts we recommend you to call the governmental emergency number

therapist.meet-p: Our therapists are selected based on their effectiveness, and they are all certified and highly qualified

about-us.made-p1: Our mission is to bring everyone's mental health to its peak.
about-us.made-p2: We've committed to making our services comfortable for you. So let us work together to make your life better.

faq.a1: M.therapy is a platform that can help you find the finest mental health consultation.
faq.a2: M.therapy can assist you by analyzing your mental health and recommending the appropriate counsellor to talk with.
faq.a3: There are currently no in-person sessions, however this may change soon.
faq.q4: How can I prepare for first session
faq.a4: Begin by comp leting the questionnaire, and we will contact you as soon as possible.
faq.q5: Are my data save on M.therapy
faq.a5: M.therapy ensures that your data is kept private and never falls into anyones hands.
faq.q6: Can I use M.therapy for sever cases
faq.a6: M.therapy assists you by providing the finest mental health consultation; if you are having a serious situation, please call 80025050

plans.plan-1: Best option for You to get the best Consultation.
plans.plan-2: Best option for You to keep up with your health.
